name: Mugen Plus
description:
Hello guys, i am Lhachimi.I've Been doing mugen for a year now.

I want to share with you all my first full mugen game.

MUGEN PLUS

I'd love to get some feedback Thank you for you time!

[Description]

Author: LHACHIMI

Email Address: mohamedlh2002@gmail.com

Game Title: Mugen Plus

Game Category: Fighting (winmugen)

Game Size: 4GB

Mugen Version: 1.0

PC Requirements:Windows/NT/XP/7 (easy to run on low devices)

THIS IS THE FIRST VERSION OF MUGEN PLUS WITH A TON OF CHARACTERS,STAGES & LONG BATTLES (15 MATCHES TO COMPLETE THE GAME) & IS A LOT AAAALLLLOT OF FUN 

LOAD UP THE GAME 

THERES NOW 100+ CHARACTERS & 100 STAGES WITH 20 DIFFERENT ICONIC ANIME SERIES!! 

ENJOY. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*V1 Update:

-Campaign mode is here!(Includes):

     +New Story mode with amazing cutscenes!

     +Cinema mode were you can watch and fight in different Anime Episodes!

*V2 Update:(Coming later)

     +Championship mode :Fight your way to the top!

     +Mini mode:(Unlocked by completing Championship mode)You get to select & fight with tiny cute DBZ characters!

Notes: -In the first dbz characters row press Up key to select a transformation!(ex: goku ssj)

               -For Coop mode,if play simultaneously is bugged one of the players must select a one piece character.  

[Disclaimer]

The project built on hundreds of creators Chars, Stages etc.., I only collected and modified them!

I dont know all the creators name, so if you see your creation in the list tell me your name and i'll put you in.

Screenpack: Lhachimi

Story and cinema mode: Lhachimi

Life Bar: Lhachimi
